√chand 'seem, please'

present: [2.] chantsi  chantti   -- [1.] chandati  

perfect: cachanda  cachadyāt  

aorist: [3.] acachadat   -- [4.] achān  achāntta  achāntsus  chantsat  

secondary: causative: chadáyati etc.  chandayati etc. B.+  chandayate  chandyate etc. E.+  

derivatives: -chad  chánda V.+  chandá RV.  chandaka E.+  chándya RV.  chandana C.  chándas V.+  chándu RV.  

Of very questionable relationship to √chad 'cover', although the two are not separated by the Hindu grammarians.
